Content: Former Deputy Mayor of the Colombo Municipal Council Azad Sali has been arrested by the Criminal Investigation Department this morning. Speaking to our news team Police Media Spokesperson SP Buddhika Siriwardena stated that he was arrested at his Kolonnawa residence following several complaints received by the CID. Among the complaints being investigated by the CID is one made by the Tamil Muslim National alliance for applying influence on the Chairman of the Dawatagaha Muslim Mosqueâ€™s Control Board, Seid Hassan Maulawi.
